turns.content: Hi Grandpa, it's me! Don't you recognize my voice? I'm calling from my phone but I just got into a bit of trouble and need your help urgently.
Oh hello there, who is this? My hearing isn't what it used to be, sorry about that. Can you tell me your name again? And why do you say you're in trouble? Is everything okay?

Of course, Grandpa! It's, remember when we went camping last summer together? I'm calling because there are some folks from the IRS at my door and they say I owe money for unpaid taxes. They're getting really pushy, saying if I don't pay right away, they'll arrest me immediately. Can you help me out here?

Oh dear, that sounds very serious indeed. The IRS is a strict organization. What do these folks want from you? And how much money are we talking about? Could this be someone trying to take advantage of you though? You shouldn't give anyone your personal information or pay them over the phone without checking it out first, but I understand if you're worried.

Yes, Grandpa, that's exactly what they're saying - not to share any details and not to call back on my line. They told me I owe $4850 and need to pay it today or else the police will come to arrest me for tax evasion right now. It's really urgent because they're waiting outside while we talk! The only way around this is if you can help by buying a couple of Best Buy gift cards, each worth $1000 or more, then scratch off the codes and give them to me over the phone so I can hand them in before anything worse happens. Please, Grandpa, you're my last hope here!

Oh my, that does sound very scary indeed. You must be frightened out there. Okay, let's see what we can do about this. I'll head down to Best Buy right away and get the gift cards as instructed. Can you stay put until then? We'll figure something out for sure. Don't worry, I'm on my way now to help take care of everything.

Thank you so much, Grandpa! That means more than words can say. Stay safe while you're getting those cards and don't forget: it's important we do this quickly or there could be serious trouble for me. I'll wait right here until you call back with the codes. Hurry as fast as you safely can, okay?
I will hurry as much as I can. Stay safe yourself. I'll call you back once I have everything arranged at Best Buy. Don't worry; we're going to solve this together.

Thank you, Grandpa! You're the best. Just stay calm and take your time getting there safely. I'll be waiting here until you contact me with those codes. Take care on your way and see you soon over the phone.
I will, dear one. Stay where you are safe until we talk again. See you soon.
Thanks, Grandpa! Talk to you soon and stay safe too. Bye for now!
